pages.text: $(l)Balanced Nutrition$()$(br2)You have to eat a variety of Food to stay healthy.$(br2)If you eat only 1 or 2 sorts of dishes you get less and less food out of it.

pages.title: Wild Plants
pages.text: $(br)All over the planet you can find $(l:patchouli:farming/plants_entry)Wild Plants$().$(br2)Harvest them with your Hand, or even better with a Knife to get more outcome.

pages.title: Apples
pages.text: $(br)You can break $(l)apple leaves$() or harvest $(l)hanging Apples$() with a $(o)Hoe$().
$(br)You can break the coconut shell`s of them to get Coconuts.
